text:
BJSS | Head of AI, Chatbot Engineer, Cognitive Architect, Technology Consultant, Security Engineer, BI Developer | United Kingdom | ONSITE | Full Time

BJSS is an award winning Agile Delivery business, working with some of the UK's largest businesses. Our focus is on building bespoke solutions for our clients from the ground up. We typically work on very challenging projects, which give us exposure to a wide range of technologies, including new and emerging tech.

We have a very collaborative culture and we looking for people who align to our forward thinking and innovative approach. Think of us as an established start-up.

This is just a flavour of some of our key roles that we are recruiting for. For more information, please go to https://www.bjss.com/joinus/
